name: Bucket Montage
description:
A large amount of monster synthesis RPG that mixes everything

□ -Synopsis- □

A world full of black magic and mysterious monsters
Due to the monarchy and civilizations scattered in various places, the power was competing

In the midst of this, a dubious biological research was being conducted under the water.
A large number of synthetic beasts that are created by synthesizing cells
The days of dark servants who rule over monsters begin

□ -Introduction to the game- □

Collect monsters and synthesize them to attack various places! Over 600 types of monsters! !
Free capture system! It's OK to proceed from anywhere in the four areas!
Symbol encounter adoption! Equipped with a linkage system that becomes a simultaneous battle when you engage with multiple enemies!
Skill CP system! Inherit skills and set free skills!
Random enchantment! Equipment appears randomly with incomprehensible abilities!
Abnormal status stacking system! The effect becomes stronger by duplicating!
Item production! Materials can be used to create tools and medicines!
Map action! By learning monster skills, the number of actions that can be performed on the map will increase!
(Holding rocks, gathering, digging, prospecting, fishing, etc.)
Wandering NPC! Rivals prowling the world, will they be enemies or allies?
Good/bad system! It's up to you to live as a good person or a bad person in this world
Create tactics! It is possible to set detailed conditions and have automatic battles!
Let's break through by making full use of a lot of other elements and information!
